Contents

* [Class Skills](#class_skills)
* [Class Features](#class_features)
  + [Weapon and Armor Proficiency](#weapon_and_armor_proficiency)
  + [Spells per Day](#spells_per_day)
  + [Monitor Familiar (Ex)](#monitor_familiar_ex)
  + [Obedience (Ex)](#obedience_ex)
  + [Soultended (Ex)](#soultended_ex)
  + [Monitor Expression (Su)](#monitor_expression_su)
  + [Monitor Boon](#monitor_boon)

sections.title: Proctor (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Proctor class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Proctor)
sections.description: A proctor gains proficiency with her monitor demigod's favored weapon.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Proctor)
sections.description: At indicated levels, a proctor gains spells per day and increased caster level as if gaining levels in a previous spellcasting class, but no other class benefits.

sections.title: Monitor Familiar (Ex) (Proctor)
sections.description: The proctor gains an arbiter, nosoi, paracletus, or voidworm familiar appropriate to her monitor demigod, functioning as wizard's arcane bond with Improved Familiar feat.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Proctor)
sections.description: A proctor must perform daily obedience to her monitor demigod to maintain all abilities granted by the prestige class, including augmented spellcasting.

sections.title: Soultended (Ex) (Proctor)
sections.description: Upon death, a proctor's soul transforms into a monitor outsider on neutral Outer Planes, making resurrection harder but granting +2 Will save bonus.

sections.title: Monitor Expression (Su) (Proctor)
sections.description: At 2nd level, a proctor chooses a specific expression (executor, foster, harmonizer, or impulsive) that provides different supernatural benefits and cannot be changed.

sections.title: Monitor Boon (Proctor)
sections.description: A proctor gains three progressively powerful boons from her monitor demigod at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels, using total character level for spell-like abilities.

sections.title: Summon Monitor (Sp) (Proctor)
sections.description: At 4th level, cast summon monster VI once per day to conjure monitors based on expression; at 8th level, also gain summon monster VIII once per day.

sections.title: Solemn Voice (Su) (Proctor)
sections.description: At 7th level, gain communication abilities based on monitor expression: tongues, speak with dead, or telepathy.

sections.title: Expression Immunities (Su) (Proctor)
sections.description: At 10th level, gain immunities based on monitor expression: ability damage/drain/energy drain, death/disease/poison, critical hits, or unwilling transmutation.
